description: System-generated unique identifier for this location change record used as the primary key.
Date and time the location change event was recorded in the system.
User account that performed or submitted the location update.
Identifier of the asset (vehicle or equipment) whose location changed.
Snapshot of the asset’s identifier at the time of the change for historical reporting; confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the asset’s descriptive name/details as of the change for audit and reporting.
Identifier of the origin location prior to the move.
Snapshot of the origin location’s identifier as of the change for point-in-time accuracy.
Snapshot description of the origin location at the time of the change.
Identifier of the destination location after the move.
Snapshot of the destination location’s identifier as of the change for historical accuracy.
Snapshot description of the destination location at the time of the change.
Timestamp when this record was last updated by any process or user.
Likely the timestamp of the last user-driven modification to this record; confirm with SME.
User account that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
User account that last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified.
